articles.title: UK is only country in Europe where Covid cases are surging, grim graph reveals... - The Sun
articles.content:
THE UK is the only country in Europe seeing a surge in Covid cases, grim graphs reveal.
Infections are being driven by the new Delta variant that first emerged in India.

articles.title: China made a 'huge strategic blunder' in retaliating against Europe, former U.S. negotiator says - CNBC
articles.description: The European Parliament last month paused the ratification of a new investment pact with China until Beijing lifted sanctions on the EU.
articles.content:
China made a "huge strategic blunder" when it retaliated against Europe by imposing sanctions on EU politicians, former top White House trade negotiator Clete Willems said.
